t: Constellation Brands Invests in Karma Wellness Water - BevNET.com
s: February 20, 2020 - Constellation Brands announced this week it has acquired a minority ownership stake in Karma Culture LLC, the makers of Karma Wellness Water. The deal marks the beer and spirits giant’s first investment in a non-alcoholic beverage brand through its Constellation Ventures arm.
